text: Maulana Ameer Zaman (; 1956 â€“ 7 September 2021) was a Pakistani politician. He was Minister for Postal Services from August 2017 to May 2018. He had been a member of the National Assembly of Pakistan, from June 2013 to May 2018. Zaman died on 7 September 2021 at the age of 65.JUI-F leader Maulana Ameer Zaman passes away ==References== Category:1956 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Politicians from Balochistan (Pakistan)
